timeline.bodyText: Can we delegate this to a common method? something like: validateNodes(Node... nodes) that loops through and validates

replies.bodyText:
Can do that Supun? I’ve done that in each “modify” methods in nodes.
But, if we do that, we won’t be able to provide precise error messages. That is why I wanted to do a null check for each parameter.
